executable.title: Fix interleaved motion using inverse interpolation
executable.description: This tool splits an interleaved input image into the pass images, co-registers them, and reconstructs a motion-corrected image
executable.contributor: Torsten Rohlfing, Michael P. Hasak, Greg Jefferis, Calvin R. Maurer, Daniel B. Russakoff
executable.acknowledgements: CMTK is supported by the National Institute of Biomedical Imaging and BioEngineering under Grant EB008381

double.description: Set padding value for input image. Pixels with this value will be ignored.
double.name: padding_value
double.label: padding_value

string-enumeration.description: Define interleave axis: this is the through-slice direction of the acquisition.
string-enumeration.name: interleave_axis
string-enumeration.label: interleave_axis

string.description: Set contribution weight for a pass in the form 'pass:weight'
string.name: pass_weight
string.label: pass_weight

image.description: Use a separate high-resolution reference image for registration
image.name: reference_image
image.label: reference_image

string-enumeration.description: Registration metric for motion estimation by image-to-image registration.
string-enumeration.name: registration_metric
string-enumeration.label: registration_metric

file.description: Path of file from which to import transformations between passes.
file.name: import_xforms_path
file.label: import_xforms_path

file.description: Path of file to which to export transformations between passes.
file.name: export_xforms_path
file.label: export_xforms_path

double.description: Standard deviation of Gaussian kernel for volume injection in multiples of pixel size in each direction.
double.name: injection_kernel_sigma
double.label: injection_kernel_sigma

double.description: Truncation radius factor of injection kernel. The kernel is truncated at sigma*radius, where sigma is the kernel standard deviation.
double.name: injection_kernel_radius
double.label: injection_kernel_radius

string-enumeration.description: Kernel for the inverse interpolation reconstruction
string-enumeration.name: inverse_interpolation_kernel
string-enumeration.label: inverse_interpolation_kernel

boolean.description: Use fourth-order (rather than second-order) error for optimization.
boolean.name: fourth_order_error
boolean.label: fourth_order_error

integer.description: Maximum number of inverse interpolation iterations
integer.name: num_iterations
integer.label: num_iterations

double.description: Set constraint weight for Tikhonov-type L-Norm regularization (0 disables constraint)
double.name: l_norm_weight
double.label: l_norm_weight

image.description: Write initial volume injection image to path
image.name: write_injected_image
image.label: write_injected_image

boolean.description: Write output images as floating point [default: same as input]
boolean.name: write_images_as_float
boolean.label: write_images_as_float
